description:
Whether or not Abe no Seimei had actual supernatural powers might be in doubt, but his status as a superstar of Heian Kyoto can`t be denied. Learn about the onmyoji who would go on to be called the Merlin of Japan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: He Can Do Anything, That Abe no Seimei!
Nandemo Yaru Ka, Abe no Seimei!
なんでもやる課, 安倍晴明!
